Posts.Content: Hi Gail and Julia, I highly recommend these two internet lists for anyone with metastatic breast cancer. On them there are many women with all types of metastasis, including liver. They have been through many treatments and they are all wonderful people who can answer many of your questions. If you feel alone with this diagnosis, you will feel much better as a member of either or both of these groups. 1) http://listserv.acor.org/archives/club-mets- bc.htmlhttp:/ 2) /www.bcmets.org/ Good Luck, Laura
Posts.Title: Breast Cancer Metastasi to The Liver
